author: Special Correspondent
text:
Burglars attacked the watchman of a granite, marble yard here and attempted to steal cash and valuables.

Police said two unidentified persons, who entered the firm near NGO Colony intersection selling marble and granite, broke the office door shortly after Friday midnight even as watchman Ajay (42) of Bihar was sleeping in the nearby room.

On hearing the noise, Ajay came out of the room and confronted the burglars, who attacked the watchman with clubs and iron rods. The watchman sustained head injuries.

As no cash was kept in the office, the culprits left the premises after beating Ajay again. He has been hospitalised. Palayamkottai Crime Branch police have registered a case.
title: Burglars attack watchman, attempt to steal cash
